title: Pledges Aren’t Payments: A Grant-Equivalent Look at Climate Finance
text:
Findings






Tip



One idea per chart. Captions must carry the claim.




Code
# Demo placeholder. Replace with real data.
import pandas as pd, numpy as np, matplotlib.pyplot as plt
years = np.arange(2015, 2025)
pledges = np.linspace(10, 60, len(years))
disb = pledges * np.linspace(0.3, 0.8, len(years))
plt.plot(years, pledges, label="Pledges")
plt.plot(years, disb, label="Disbursements (grant-equivalent)")
plt.legend()
plt.xlabel("Year"); plt.ylabel("USD (bn)")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()








Figure 1: Pledges vs. disbursements over time: the gap and the lag.
